name: Happy Earth Zachte Body Lotion Baby & Kids
composition:
INGREDIENTS:
Aqua, Helianthus Annuus Hybrid Oil*,
Coco-Caprylate/ Caprate, Glycerin,
Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Myristyl
Myristate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate,
Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Parfum, Glyceryl
Stearate SE, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Sodium
Cetearyl Sulfate, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol,
Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil*, Bisabolol,
Levulinic Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Potassium
Sorbate, Sodium Anisate, Citric Acid.
* Natural oil
